html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-06632023-06-23232022FIN
ActBudget Implementation Act, 2022, No. 1
SubjectOrder Fixing June 30, 2023 as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of the Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1 Come Into Force
PrecisOrder fixing June 30, 2023 as the day on which sections 140 and 143 to 148 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2021, No. 1 COME INTO FORCE in order to update and expand the unclaimed asset regime by mandating electronic communication with asset owners by financial institutions, increasing the information provided by financial institutions to the Bank of Canada, and adding foreign denominated assets to those subject to the regime.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Fixing June 30, 2023 as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of the Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1 Come Into Force
precis: Order fixing June 30, 2023 as the day on which sections 140 and 143 to 148 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2021, No. 1 COME INTO FORCE in order to update and expand the unclaimed asset regime by mandating electronic communication with asset owners by financial institutions, increasing the information provided by financial institutions to the Bank of Canada, and adding foreign denominated assets to those subject to the regime.
